"1.Donate for 15-30 Dollar(~HKD100) you will get fully function and custmosize 2.Donate at least 15 dollar 3.After donate join the chat room at below :Home-Join chatroom 5.And capture your transformation information ,donation send to chatroom of pm the developer (Press the chat room below)"

"1. Donation in order to reduce server costs 2. We always want to have some rewards as developers and stay up late and your encouragement 3. Your donation will be our greatest encouragement, let us be more Passionate production 4. A pack of cigarettes, a cup of coffee, and even a breakfast are sure to encourage and care for us"

Make the following settings take effect on the Leo side screen
Timeout，Please make sure your root manager is running，and try again！
Direct fingerprint unlock after rebooting the device
Flash Boot/kernel image,make sure your file is suitable with your device,Flashing incorrect image will cause your phone bootloop or other problem!
Flash EFS image, If flashing the wrong image ,you will lost IMEI AND CANT NOT BOOT UP!!
Flash TWRP recovery , We cant not ensure your recovery is correct ,Make sure your recovery file is suitable for your devices!
Flash into your device,make sure your file is suitable with your device
